name: Perrin's 2010 Mix Tape
description:
Let's Typing Some English / Inside Job / Alfredo / Critical Bypass / Blind Faith / Darkening / Winter Days / My Kingdom / Spinzy / Find The Trumpet / A Familiar Horror / Garden of Delight / Portable Bastard / Driftwood / No One Died / Fishing Days / Local Service / Lithia / Test Subject Infinity / Pocket Masters / Droppery / Dreams of how we once were / Let's Get This Over With / MMMMMM / Dungeon Bastard / Whale of a Time / Detective Story / Noisy Boat / Enlighten Me Up / Gone With Her Dignity / Kiss from a Rose

2010 was a great year of experimentation for me, I took part in tons of game jams and made all sorts of stuff. Most of it terrible but with more than a few seeds of interesting ideas. Packaged together in one handy download is a year of game development done with wild abandon. Some of these games were made in an hour, many in 3 hours, some even took a few weeks. This is an eclectic mix of game genres and themes that will hopefully give you some enjoyable moments along the way.
